name: src/authorisation_store.js
query
description: the query params the user is currently showing

name: set
description: sets and saves a value against the store

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} - a promise to have saved the value

params.name: key
params.description: the key to store the value against

return.description: a promise to have saved the value

name: get
description: gets a value saved against the specified key

unknown.tagValue: {object} - the value at the specified key or null

params.name: key
params.description: the key the value is saved against

return.description: the value at the specified key or null

name: delete
description: removes any value saved against the specified key permanently

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} - a promise to have deleted the value from the store

params.name: key
params.description: the key the value is saved against

return.description: a promise to have deleted the value from the store

name: done
description: mark the current authorization flow as complete i.e. after having swapped all access tokens and request tokens

name: redirect
description:
redirect the user to the specified uri
the user is no longer present after this call so should only happen at the end of a flow

params.name: uri
params.description: the uri to redirect the user to

name: src/connector_interface.js
src/index.js
src/oauth2_connector.js

params.name: configuration
params.description: the configuration details for this connector

params.name: configuration.baseSite
params.description: the base uri to use for authorization calls

params.name: configuration.authorizationPath
params.description: the path to send users to authorise access

params.name: configuration.accessTokenPath
params.description: the path to use to retrieve access tokens

name: _authorizeParams
description: Populate any extra params needed to grant access

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<object>} - an object containing key value pairs to send with the client to the authorization url

return.description: an object containing key value pairs to send with the client to the authorization url

name: _accessParams
description: Populate any extra params needed to request the access token

unknown.tagValue: {Promise<object>} - an object containing key value pairs to send with the access token request

return.description: an object containing key value pairs to send with the access token request

params.name: requestUri
params.description: the uri of the request to call

name: authorize
description: authorize the oauth connection with existing parameters

name: src/oauth_connector.js

params.name: configuration
params.description: the configuration details for this connector

params.name: configuration.requestTokenUri
params.description: the uri to use for request token calls

params.name: configuration.accessTokenUri
params.description: the uri to use for access token calls

params.name: configuration.authorizationUri
params.description: the uri to send users to authorise access

params.name: configuration.oauthVersion
params.description: the version of OAuth to use

params.name: requestUri
params.description: the uri of the request to call

name: authorize
description: authorize the oauth connection with existing parameters
